subtitles:
176720 179280 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
179360 182320 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

183120 185680 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
199320 201710 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

209840 212560 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

212640 216320 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

216400 221430 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

221520 224830 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

233080 236120 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

238160 242280 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
242360 243880 We'll get you out of here.

243960 248430 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
265080 267120 Get it off! Get it off!

270600 273670 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

282000 285070 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

961840 964600 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

972400 974870 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1002360 1004510 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1033280 1037830 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1039920 1044920 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1045000 1048880 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1059040 1061840 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1068360 1071720 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1076120 1082280 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1082360 1085960 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1110480 1116480 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1116560 1120560 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1121400 1124040 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1124120 1128640 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1132360 1135080 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1137600 1139990 There was something in the blood.

1141400 1146160 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1153000 1155600 And that's when the exodus started.

1159640 1163160 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1165440 1168240 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1171080 1173920 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1176440 1180360 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1180440 1184560 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1185960 1188920 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1189520 1193520 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1211160 1215000 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1215080 1217550 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1231720 1235950 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1238360 1242280 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1246280 1249720 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1263800 1266840 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1424480 1428270 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1434480 1438790 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1441320 1446440 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1447040 1449320 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1449400 1452600 even though cash was completely useless.
1454080 1457070 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1462400 1464630 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1466720 1468950 I remember the ground was soft.

1470840 1475040 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1475120 1478910 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1479000 1482790 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1482880 1486080 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1487640 1490600 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1490680 1492960 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1495160 1499920 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1500000 1503710 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1517240 1522190 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1524760 1527480 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1527560 1530760 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1629240 1631440 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1639960 1641950 I'll start working on them, then.

1674040 1676880 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1676960 1679080 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1682200 1685000 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1721320 1723310 Do you have any clothes here?

1726280 1729800 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1729880 1733400 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1761000 1763880 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1763960 1767720 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1767800 1772960 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1773040 1777270 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1777360 1782280 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1782360 1787560 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1787640 1791680 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1791760 1796040 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1798600 1801070 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1857400 1860390 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1860480 1863440 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1880640 1882630 Now I do need a break.

1901600 1906680 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1907840 1911920 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1914120 1916270 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1916360 1921230 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

1926720 1929630 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2003840 2006720 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2006800 2009000 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2041040 2044000 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2058640 2060840 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2060920 2063830 Why don't you all sit down and...
2063920 2066760 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2066840 2069230 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2079760 2082640 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2082720 2085480 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2107320 2110280 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2137920 2143280 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2144880 2147030 You'll have to use the bucket.
2153320 2155840 Have to empty it each morning.

2155920 2159440 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2161240 2164230 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2177040 2179320 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2214520 2218070 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2219160 2221880 Probably need us more than we need them.

2232720 2237190 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2237280 2240880 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2245160 2248550 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2263960 2267080 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2268880 2272720 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2303600 2305590 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2305680 2309640 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2309720 2312790 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2328600 2332680 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2332760 2336360 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2351760 2354750 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2363320 2366920 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2367000 2371390 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2371480 2374360 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2374440 2378750 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2378840 2380960 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2384280 2388670 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2392120 2395880 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2395960 2398240 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2398320 2401120 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2404720 2409320 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2414960 2420800 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2420880 2423920 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2424000 2426390 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2426480 2430270 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2432080 2436200 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2436280 2439640 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2439720 2443840 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2443920 2446640 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2446720 2450640 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2454920 2460390 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2463720 2468800 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2469480 2471470 So we have to try and get there.

2485040 2488640 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2516040 2518920 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2519000 2524030 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2540920 2543310 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2544160 2547390 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2547480 2551680 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2551760 2554560 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2588760 2591070 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2591160 2594360 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2596760 2598830 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2612840 2616230 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2646920 2651040 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2651120 2654240 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2660440 2665360 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2675800 2678600 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2691440 2693800 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2767160 2770600 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2770680 2772430 I think you can eat that raw.

2779800 2784110 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2788640 2792110 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2799880 2803000 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2855640 2858600 Either we do this now or we're walking.

2908680 2911240 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3005360 3008040 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3080880 3083760 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3084560 3087240 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3146040 3149590 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3149680 3153680 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3154680 3158360 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3162680 3165800 Um... that's what you were thinking.
3168880 3171080 I was thinking I was wrong.

3182040 3186350 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3187680 3190990 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3193560 3197030 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3200520 3202910 See, that's what I was thinking.

3219960 3223800 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3250960 3253520 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3269640 3273350 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3273440 3277560 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3280160 3282630 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3282720 3286270 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3286360 3288510 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3300480 3303080 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3304120 3307960 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3381720 3384400 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3437440 3440800 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3440880 3445670 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3469240 3473550 Our location is the
42nd blockade, the M602,
3480720 3483630 The answer to Infection is here.
3518480 3521710 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3523480 3525710 No fire crews to put it out.

3651320 3655160 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3655240 3658230 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3664800 3669430 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3781080 3783880 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3783960 3786350 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
3847000 3849560 Three survivors. One male, two female.
3849640 3852840 I repeat, one male, two female.

3915000 3919680 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
3919760 3922070 So you can all have a shower.
3922160 3925360 You look like you need one. Please.

3944480 3949480 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
3957920 3960960 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

3972760 3976200 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

3979880 3984670 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

3984760 3988520 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
3989760 3992070 I want her to be OK.
3993600 3995670 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
3995760 3998440 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4036920 4040280 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4040360 4046230 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4048560 4052560 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4056880 4061190 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4061560 4064360 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4064440 4067430 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4067520 4070480 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4080120 4085750 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4089320 4093400 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4093480 4097950 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4101080 4105790 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4105880 4108190 The belly of the house. The heart.

4108280 4113310 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4115480 4117520 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4117600 4120670 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4120760 4124640 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4127080 4129960 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4153360 4158230 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4165600 4169480 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4191240 4194520 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4205680 4210840 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4248960 4251320 You'll have to wait and see
4253640 4256110 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4271840 4275070 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4282360 4284720 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4284800 4287870 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4287960 4290950 but this omelette will do just as well.

4305880 4309640 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4309720 4313000 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4319680 4322360 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4323160 4328400 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4328480 4332840 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4332920 4336040 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4336120 4338840 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4338920 4342800 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4342880 4347030 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4347120 4350110 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4352120 4356080 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4356800 4359160 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4360120 4362320 that is a return to normality.

4366160 4369040 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4369120 4372240 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4375000 4380000 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4382680 4386640 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4389320 4393680 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4393760 4399000 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4399080 4402550 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4410520 4413360 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4416200 4419320 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4420200 4423190 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4427120 4429080 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4478760 4482230 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4498240 4500440 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4522160 4527560 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4527640 4529760 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4531480 4536560 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4538120 4540190 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4546160 4550470 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4557880 4560790 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4560880 4564190 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4574240 4576840 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4579600 4582070 The rest of you, go with him.

4603560 4607600 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4607680 4609160 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4609240 4614190 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4621160 4624150 I killed... I killed a boy.

4635320 4639920 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4660040 4663670 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4664800 4669320 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4669400 4672160 What could I say to him?

4672240 4677240 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4678120 4681800 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4681880 4687750 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4704600 4706320 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4706400 4708390 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4714280 4716160 We get in the car and we go!

4717480 4721840 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4721920 4725040 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4725120 4727720 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4741080 4743310 I want to give you a chance.
4747000 4749200 But I can't let them go.

4776120 4778760 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4778840 4781640 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4781720 4784520 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4784600 4788070 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4788160 4792390 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4792480 4795630 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

4795720 4801190 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

4802200 4806080 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
4807400 4810390 Just imagine, just think about it.
4811400 4813600 How could Infection cross the oceans?

4813680 4817800 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

4817880 4820480 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

4820560 4824400 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

4828520 4831960 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

4840360 4844560 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

4889200 4892190 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

4893240 4898160 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

4898240 4902000 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
4905680 4907670 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

4931640 4934920 Come on then, you fucking
pansies. Do me first.
4935000 4937390 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

4937480 4940390 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

4943120 4946030 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

4946120 4947950 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

4948040 4951350 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

4960280 4964070 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

4964160 4968160 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
4969360 4972080 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

4974480 4977550 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

4986920 4988750 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5003600 5006910 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5044360 5048150 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5048240 5051680 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5051760 5054200 which she certainly has no use for.
5055160 5056910 You can't do it to Hannah.

5057000 5060550 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5073520 5076200 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5076280 5079480 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5097480 5101440 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5103240 5106790 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5106880 5110880 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5133680 5136440 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5158560 5162350 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5162440 5164510 Are you trying to kill me?
5166840 5169280 I'm making you not care. OK?
5180760 5183320 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5188920 5191390 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5412040 5414400 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5415400 5419190 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5421840 5424360 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5437000 5439390 I think they're having an effect.

5454320 5457080 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5457800 5460760 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5460840 5462750 Is that the way it works?

5466160 5470080 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5488240 5491230 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5491320 5494040 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5515200 5520520 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5528160 5531390 Dont just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5552920 5555760 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5581240 5584840 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

5756240 5760440 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

5821240 5825840 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

5825920 5830200 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
5830280 5832510 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
5894240 5896630 That was longer than a heartbeat.
5910320 5913710 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
5919240 5921630 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

5921720 5924920 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
5933080 5936520 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
5936600 5938590 But I thought he was biting you.
5938680 5941240 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
5943480 5945520 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6039800 6042110 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6132000 6134560 You looked all right in this, you know.

6155320 6158520 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6211720 6214520 Do you think he saw us this time?
